objectArray.text: Select the Style, equipment, formation or inherited skill/spell you wish to change.
Tap the Style you want to change, then tap the Confirm button.
Tap the equipment slot (Weapon, Armor, Gear, or Accessory) you want to change and the piece of equipment you want to use, then tap the Confirm button.
Select the character whose position you want to change.
Select the formation you want to use.
Change the amplification status or BP cost and check abilities.
Select the Style whose skills or spells you want to awaken.
Select the skill or spell you want to awaken.
Select the skill or spell you want to awaken.
Select a Style to set as your favorite.
Select the Style whose level cap you want to unlock.
Hold the Enhance Style button to use experience points to raise the Style's level.
Select the Style you want to enhance.
Select the items you want to sell. Tap the Sell All button to sell all selected items.
Select Enhancement Materials you wish to use, then press Enhance button.
Select an evolution path.
Select an evolution path.
Selected materials can be converted into their higher-rank counterparts.
Select equipment.
Select the equipment you want to sell.
Unclaimed presents will be automatically deleted 30 days after delivery to the present box.
Select the Style whose level cap you want to unlock.

Tap the Unlock Level Cap button to spend Style Pieces and unlock the Style's level cap. If you don't have enough of a Style's pieces, universal Style Pieces (gold, silver, or bronze) can be used instead.
Select characters to send on the Expedition.
Select the Style that you want to train.
Select characters to begin training.
Select multiple items and tap the Sell All button to exchange the items for aurum.
Select an Expedition location and characters. Recommended attributes and items that can be obtained vary depending on location.
You can exchange specific Style Pieces to obtain that Style.
Tap the Death Match button to start a Death Match.
Select the icon for the Hidden Attribute whose cap you want to unlock.
Select the Style whose Hidden Attribute caps you wish to unlock.
Only Styles with available skins will be displayed. Select the Style whose skin you want to change.
Only skins that have been obtained will be displayed.
Select Holy Stone.
Select equipment to set the Holy Stone in.
Select the Style whose skills or spells you want to amplify.
Select the skill or spell you want to amplify.
Select the Style, equipment, formation or inherited skill/spell you wish to change.
Select and set the party you wish to take on Well quests from Final Battle parties.
Tap the list to go to Edit Favorites.
Use materials to forge equipment.
Select the Style whose Dojo Rank you wish to promote.
Consume specific items and Style Enhancement EXP to promote the Dojo Rank of a character.
Select the Main Quest to take on.
Tap on the screen to zoom in on the image.
Select equipment.
Tap on the Style you wish to use. Tap Confirm to confirm change, or tap Remove to remove Style from party.
Tap on the enemy you wish to use. Tap Confirm to confirm change, or tap Remove to remove the enemy.
Tap on the skill/spell you wish to use. Tap Confirm to confirm change.
Tap on the background you wish to use. Tap Confirm to confirm change.
Select positions you wish to swap. Tap Confirm to confirm change.
Tap Evolve to do one evolution. Tap 1-Tap Enhance to move to the 1-Tap Enhance screen.
Select equipment for Super Evolution.
Tap Super Evolve to do one Super Evolution.
